mapper.sql: id, supervision_type_id, pid, stage_index, name, supervision_org_id, supervision_user_id, preparer_org_id, preparer_id, preparer_time,end_time,is_stept,status
mapper.select: select i.*,m.name AS sType from t_item AS i LEFT JOIN `t_meta` AS m ON m.`id`=i.`supervision_type_id` WHERE i.`id`=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into t_item (id, supervision_type_id, pid, stage_index, name, supervision_org_id, supervision_user_id, preparer_org_id, preparer_id, preparer_time,end_time,is_stept,status) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{supervisionTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stageIndex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supervisionOrgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{supervisionUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{preparerOrgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{preparerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{preparerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{entTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isStept,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update t_item
supervision_type_id = #{supervisionTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
stage_index = #{stageIndex,jdbcType=TINYINT},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supervision_org_id = #{supervisionOrgId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
supervision_user_id = #{supervisionUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
preparer_org_id = #{preparerOrgId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
preparer_id = #{preparerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
preparer_time = #{preparerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{entTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_stept = #{isStept,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_item set supervision_type_id = #{supervisionTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stage_index = #{stageIndex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supervision_org_id = #{supervisionOrgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, supervision_user_id = #{supervisionUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, preparer_org_id = #{preparerOrgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, preparer_id = #{preparerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, preparer_time = #{preparerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{entTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_stept = #{isStept,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select name from t_item where name=#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
